sentences: Along with the timing of the AR4 Synthesis Report, attention both in the corridors and in plenary shifted to consideration of election procedures, emission scenarios, aerosols, outreach and the budget.
One issue that caught the passing attention of many delegates was Minister Dion`s reference to COP-11 and COP/MOP-1 as the 'Climate Change Conference.
' Most thought this was simply a matter of word choice, but one observer wondered if the changing terminology represented a desire to shift the attention towards 'climate change' more generally.
